com.mixer.interactive.services

Class ParticipantServiceProvider

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mixer.interactive.services.AbstractServiceProvider
      • com.mixer.interactive.services.ParticipantServiceProvider

  • public class ParticipantServiceProvider
extends AbstractServiceProvider
    Provides all functionality relating to making requests and interpreting replies from the Interactive service regarding participants.
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Microsoft Corporation
    See Also:
    InteractiveParticipant

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Set<InteractiveParticipant> getActiveParticipants(long thresholdTimestamp)
      Retrieves all of the currently connected participants who have given input after the specified threshold time, where the threshold is given as a UTC unix timestamp (in milliseconds), in ascending order by the time they last gave input.
      com.google.common.util.concurrent.ListenableFuture<Set<InteractiveParticipant>> getActiveParticipantsAsync(long thresholdTimestamp)

    • Method Detail

      • getAllParticipants

        public Set<InteractiveParticipant> getAllParticipants()
                                               throws InteractiveReplyWithErrorException,
                                                      InteractiveRequestNoReplyException
        Retrieves all of the participants that are currently connected to the Interactive integration that this client is connected to, in ascending order by the time they connected.
        Returns:
        A Set of all InteractiveParticipants connected to the Interactive integration
        Throws:
        InteractiveReplyWithErrorException - If the reply received from the Interactive service contains an InteractiveError
        InteractiveRequestNoReplyException - If no reply is received from the Interactive service
        Since:
        1.0.0
        See Also:
        InteractiveParticipant

      • getAllParticipantsAsync

        public com.google.common.util.concurrent.ListenableFuture<Set<InteractiveParticipant>> getAllParticipantsAsync()

        Retrieves all of the participants that are currently connected to the Interactive integration that this client is connected to, in ascending order by the time they connected.

        The result of the ListenableFuture may include checked exceptions that were thrown in the event that there was a problem with the reply from the Interactive service. Specifically, two types of checked exceptions may be thrown:

        • InteractiveRequestNoReplyException may be thrown if no reply is received from the Interactive service.
        • InteractiveReplyWithErrorException may be thrown if the reply received from the Interactive service contains an InteractiveError.

        Considerations should be made for these possibilities when interpreting the results of the returned ListenableFuture.

        Returns:
        A ListenableFuture that when complete returns a Set of all InteractiveParticipants connected to the Interactive integration
        Since:
        1.0.0
        See Also:
        InteractiveParticipant

      • getActiveParticipants

        public Set<InteractiveParticipant> getActiveParticipants(long thresholdTimestamp)
                                                  throws InteractiveReplyWithErrorException,
                                                         InteractiveRequestNoReplyException
        Retrieves all of the currently connected participants who have given input after the specified threshold time, where the threshold is given as a UTC unix timestamp (in milliseconds), in ascending order by the time they last gave input.
        Parameters:
        thresholdTimestamp - A UTC unix timestamp (in milliseconds)
        Returns:
        A Set of InteractiveParticipants connected to the Interactive integration that have given input since the provided threshold, in ascending order by the time they last gave input
        Throws:
        InteractiveReplyWithErrorException - If the reply received from the Interactive service contains an InteractiveError
        InteractiveRequestNoReplyException - If no reply is received from the Interactive service
        Since:
        1.0.0
        See Also:
        InteractiveParticipant

      • getActiveParticipantsAsync

        public com.google.common.util.concurrent.ListenableFuture<Set<InteractiveParticipant>> getActiveParticipantsAsync(long thresholdTimestamp)

        Retrieves all of the currently connected participants who have given input after the specified threshold time, where the threshold is given as a UTC unix timestamp (in milliseconds), in ascending order by the time they last gave input.

        The result of the ListenableFuture may include checked exceptions that were thrown in the event that there was a problem with the reply from the Interactive service. Specifically, two types of checked exceptions may be thrown:

        • InteractiveRequestNoReplyException may be thrown if no reply is received from the Interactive service.
        • InteractiveReplyWithErrorException may be thrown if the reply received from the Interactive service contains an InteractiveError.

        Considerations should be made for these possibilities when interpreting the results of the returned ListenableFuture.

        Parameters:
        thresholdTimestamp - A UTC unix timestamp (in milliseconds)
        Returns:
        A ListenableFuture that when complete returns a Set of InteractiveParticipants connected to the Interactive integration that have given input since the provided threshold
        Since:
        1.0.0
        See Also:
        InteractiveParticipant

      • updateParticipants

        public Set<InteractiveParticipant> updateParticipants(InteractiveParticipant... participants)
                                               throws InteractiveReplyWithErrorException,
                                                      InteractiveRequestNoReplyException

        Bulk-updates a collection of participants. The Interactive service will reply with a set of updated participants.

        The Interactive service will either update all the participants provided, or fail in which case NONE of the participants provided will be updated. In no case will the Interactive service apply updates to a subset of participants. If a provided participant is not connected to the integration, the update to that participant will be ignored.

        Parameters:
        participants - An array of InteractiveParticipants to be updated
        Returns:
        A Set of updated InteractiveParticipants
        Throws:
        InteractiveReplyWithErrorException - If the reply received from the Interactive service contains an InteractiveError
        InteractiveRequestNoReplyException - If no reply is received from the Interactive service
        Since:
        1.0.0
        See Also:
        InteractiveParticipant

      • updateParticipants

        public Set<InteractiveParticipant> updateParticipants(int priority,
                                                      InteractiveParticipant... participants)
                                               throws InteractiveReplyWithErrorException,
                                                      InteractiveRequestNoReplyException

        Bulk-updates a collection of participants. The Interactive service will reply with a set of updated participants.

        The Interactive service will either update all the participants provided, or fail in which case NONE of the participants provided will be updated. In no case will the Interactive service apply updates to a subset of participants. If a provided participant is not connected to the integration, the update to that participant will be ignored.

        Parameters:
        priority - The priority value for the update
        participants - An array of InteractiveParticipants to be updated
        Returns:
        A Set of updated InteractiveParticipants
        Throws:
        InteractiveReplyWithErrorException - If the reply received from the Interactive service contains an InteractiveError
        InteractiveRequestNoReplyException - If no reply is received from the Interactive service
        Since:
        1.0.0
        See Also:
        InteractiveParticipant

      • updateParticipantsAsync

        public com.google.common.util.concurrent.ListenableFuture<Set<InteractiveParticipant>> updateParticipantsAsync(InteractiveParticipant... participants)

        Bulk-updates a collection of participants. The Interactive service will reply with a set of updated participants.

        The Interactive service will either update all the participants provided, or fail in which case NONE of the participants provided will be updated. In no case will the Interactive service apply updates to a subset of participants. If a provided participant is not connected to the integration, the update to that participant will be ignored.

        The result of the ListenableFuture may include checked exceptions that were thrown in the event that there was a problem with the reply from the Interactive service. Specifically, two types of checked exceptions may be thrown:

        • InteractiveRequestNoReplyException may be thrown if no reply is received from the Interactive service.
        • InteractiveReplyWithErrorException may be thrown if the reply received from the Interactive service contains an InteractiveError.

        Considerations should be made for these possibilities when interpreting the results of the returned ListenableFuture.

        Parameters:
        participants - An array of InteractiveParticipants to be updated
        Returns:
        A ListenableFuture that when complete returns a Set of updated InteractiveParticipants
        Since:
        1.0.0
        See Also:
        InteractiveParticipant

      • updateParticipantsAsync

        public com.google.common.util.concurrent.ListenableFuture<Set<InteractiveParticipant>> updateParticipantsAsync(int priority,
                                                                                                               InteractiveParticipant... participants)

        Bulk-updates a collection of participants. The Interactive service will reply with a set of updated participants.

        The Interactive service will either update all the participants provided, or fail in which case NONE of the participants provided will be updated. In no case will the Interactive service apply updates to a subset of participants. If a provided participant is not connected to the integration, the update to that participant will be ignored.

        The result of the ListenableFuture may include checked exceptions that were thrown in the event that there was a problem with the reply from the Interactive service. Specifically, two types of checked exceptions may be thrown:

        • InteractiveRequestNoReplyException may be thrown if no reply is received from the Interactive service.
        • InteractiveReplyWithErrorException may be thrown if the reply received from the Interactive service contains an InteractiveError.

        Considerations should be made for these possibilities when interpreting the results of the returned ListenableFuture.

        Parameters:

        participants - An array of InteractiveParticipants to be updated
